p: In the present investigation, AFMV and diclofenac sodium (standard) exhibited significant ( P<0.05) inhibition of protein denaturation in a dose-dependent manner, as shown in ( Table 4). The extract showed the highest % of inhibition (63.87 ± 1.74%) at 500 µg/mL, wherein the standard drug (diclofenac sodium) showed 86.78 ± 1.92% at the same concentration.
